ComicInfo.Summary: Death offers no respite for a recently deceased suspect, as Officer Michael Cabrini and Detective Wilson find themselves interrogating the ice cold corpse in the darkest recesses of the city morgue! But when these two Choir Boys investigate a recent drug shipment through the streets of Hellhole--the worst precinct in the inner city--they soon discover there's a reason why this new stuff is called "the Devil's candy"! More macabre mayhem from the madmen, Scott (The Darkness) Lobdell and ADAM (Witchblade Infinity and X- Force) POLLINA!
ComicInfo.Colorist: Brett Evans,Jimmy Yu,John Starr,Richard Horie,Tanya Horie,Tyson Wengler
